description: Episode of Series "Man builds - man destroys". Raises the question of whether there is such a thing as an "optimum" world population, while looking closely at the town of Huntington on Long Island, one of the many satellite communities surrounding New York City. Presents the views on population of such noted authorities as Paul Ehrlich, Barry Commoner, Philip Hauser, Alan Guttmacher and Lincoln Day. Hosted by Don Pringle.
